name: firefox-tab-suspender
description: A Firefox extension that automatic suspend tabs and saves memory

scripts._build_c:dev: emcc -O2 src/main/background/c/main.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/libs/vector/services/array_service/array_service.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/libs/vector/vector.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/providers/javascript_functions_provider/javascript_functions_provider.c src/main/background/c/core/services/event_loop_service/event_loop_service.c src/main/background/c/core/services/events_service/events_service.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_1d_action/push_event_1d_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_action/push_event_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/initialization_action/wasm_initialization_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/tabs_initialization_action/tabs_initialization_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/is_able_to_push_event_action/is_able_to_push_event_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_2d_action/push_event_2d_action.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/tabs_repository/tabs_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/settings_repository/settings_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/cache_repository/cache_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/windows_repository/windows_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/settings/settings.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/cache/cache.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/tab/tab.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/event/event.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/window/window.c src/main/background/c/core/data/data_sources/cache_data_source/cache_data_source.c src/main/background/c/core/data/data_sources/settings_data_source/settings_data_source.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=10 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o src/main/background/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' --js-library src/main/background/js/library.js -s DEMANGLE_SUPPORT=1 -frtti -g4 --source-map-base http://localhost:9090/ -s ASSERTIONS=1
scripts._build_c:dist: emcc -O2 src/main/background/c/main.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/libs/vector/services/array_service/array_service.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/libs/vector/vector.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/providers/javascript_functions_provider/javascript_functions_provider.c src/main/background/c/core/services/event_loop_service/event_loop_service.c src/main/background/c/core/services/events_service/events_service.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_1d_action/push_event_1d_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_action/push_event_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/initialization_action/wasm_initialization_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/tabs_initialization_action/tabs_initialization_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/is_able_to_push_event_action/is_able_to_push_event_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_2d_action/push_event_2d_action.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/tabs_repository/tabs_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/settings_repository/settings_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/cache_repository/cache_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/windows_repository/windows_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/settings/settings.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/cache/cache.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/tab/tab.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/event/event.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/window/window.c src/main/background/c/core/data/data_sources/cache_data_source/cache_data_source.c src/main/background/c/core/data/data_sources/settings_data_source/settings_data_source.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=10 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o src/main/background/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' --js-library src/main/background/js/library.js
scripts.build:dev: del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp && make-dir src/main/background/.tmp && npm run _build_c:dev && rig src/main/background/js/main.js > src/main/background/.tmp/background.js && NODE_ENV=development webpack && del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp
scripts.build:dist: del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp && make-dir src/main/background/.tmp && npm run _build_c:dist && rig src/main/background/js/main.js > src/main/background/.tmp/background.js && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp
scripts._build_c:test: emcc -O2 src/main/background/c/utils/array_utils/array_utils.c src/main/background/c/utils/vector/vector.c src/main/background/c/services/javascript_provider_service/javascript_provider_service.c src/main/background/c/services/events_service/events_service.c src/main/background/c/services/cache_service/cache_service.c src/main/background/c/services/event_loop_service/event_loop_service.c src/main/background/c/services/settings_provider_service/settings_provider_service.c src/main/background/c/main.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=4 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o hello.wasm -o src/__tests__/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' --js-library src/main/background/js/library.js
scripts.test: del-cli -f src/__tests__/.tmp && make-dir src/__tests__/.tmp && npm run _build_c:test && rig src/__tests__/main.js > src/__tests__/.tmp/tests.js && jest src/__tests__/.tmp/tests.js && del-cli -f src/__tests__/.tmp
